text:
A cyan atom, bold and bright,
Upon a midnight, inky sight.
React, it whispers, code's embrace,
A web of logic, time and space.

Its curves, a dance of ones and zeros,
A universe of digital heroes.
Each loop a pathway, swift and clean,
A vibrant heart, a coded scene.

From simple button to complex view,
The atom spins, its purpose true.
A framework strong, a guiding hand,
To build and shape, a digital land.

So let the code compile and run,
Beneath the light, the battle won.
React, the atom, bright and keen,
A digital creation, ever-seen.
